segments.text: I'm observing a kitchen scene right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's an adult woman standing at the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She is focused intently on drying a plate with a towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is running from the faucet, and the sink is completely overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A large puddle is forming on the floor around her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't seem to notice the water at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite astonishing how oblivious she is to the spreading flood!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression remains perfectly neutral despite the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of her feet is already submerged in the water, which is just incredible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm genuinely worried she's going to slip on that wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This level of distraction is truly remarkable to witness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost unbelievable that she hasn't reacted to this developing disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is still pouring over the edge in a continuous sheet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a truly precarious situation she's in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone really needs to turn that faucet off before everything is ruined.
segments.speaker: PAR
